document_data.mainbody:
Wall Street was a road that was located in the city of Waterdeep.
Wall Street was located in the eastern section of Waterdeeps Southern Ward. The road ran parallel to the eastern outer city wall in the Southern Ward, originating in the north in the Trades Ward on River Street, and passing south to eventually end on Coach Street. Along the way Wall Street connected with Belzers Walk, Olaims Cut, Ruids Stroll, the Specterwalk, Tilmans Lane, and the Wagonrace.
The Redbridle Stables was located along Wall Street.
